name: 1cc-portal
description: Multi-tenant CMS built on Cloudflare Workers

scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && cd apps/worker && wrangler deploy --env staging
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && npm run test && cd apps/worker && wrangler deploy --env production
scripts.reset:r2: cd apps/worker && wrangler r2 object list 1cc-portal-data-dev | grep -v '^$' | tail -n +2 | awk '{print $1}' | xargs -I {} wrangler r2 object delete 1cc-portal-data-dev/{}
